service.description:
Create a Payment for an Invoice and apply it to the Invoice.
The from/to Parties from the Invoice are reversed on the Payment.
If the amount is greater than the unpaid Invoice total the full amount will be set on the Payment, but only the unpaid Invoice total will be applied to the Invoice.
If the Invoice statusId is InvoiceInProcess/InvoiceReceived updates it to InvoiceFinalized/InvoiceApproved.
If the amount (alone or combined with previously applied Payments) is the full invoiceTotal also updates the Invoice statusId to InvoicePmtRecvd.
